feat.value: If one wants to speak about him, one would say
He was not an earthly man.
For, he was tempted by how many temptations,
and in what sort of land,
in the place where there is not an imprint of divine worship.
But the God of his fathers was with him
and saved him from every affliction.
And now he is with his fathers in the kingdom of heaven.
Then, we ourselves, too, knew our measure.
For, scarcely, in all these things are we able to flee from the judgment of God
